views.markdown:
1. Added support for iOS 12 & A12 devices. 2. Added 'Pull to Refresh' on mail calls screen - Use this feature sparingly and IF AND ONLY IF any calls are not logged by CallLogPro. CallLogPro needs latest RocketBootStrap from http://rpetri.ch/repo/. Please add this repo to your sources and install it. 1. Added support for iOS 10.x.
2. Added support for iPhone 7 and 7 Plus.
3. New light weight and flat UI makes recent calls screen elegant.
4. Completely renovated and more organized settings.
5. Added support for new CallKit, i.e. CallLogPro manages all CallKit dependent apps, like Skype or WhatsApp in its history.
6. Support for 3D touch on both CallLogPro and MobilePhone apps.

Note: After updating it might ask you to activate again, please do so. For contact pictures to be displayed on CallLogPro, you may need latest Copic 2
Whats New in 8.1.1:
========================
1. Added support for iOS 9
2. Added support for iPhone 6s and 6s Plus.
3. Added Force/3D Touch support (for devices < 6s, requires RevealMenu).
4. Added Automatic call backups feature.
5. Few enhancements and issue fixes.
Change Log 8.1:
====================
1. Added support for iOS 8.3 and 8.4
2. Fixed frequent crashes on some devices.
3. Fixed Phone app crash while trying to add a call when Replace Recents is turned on.
4. When FaceTime call is received, CallLogPro is unable to identify the caller after respring. This issue is also fixed.
5. Few other improvements and enhancements.
